text: Teresa Panza, the wife of Sancho Panza, was convinced that her husband was a jerk because he was leaving home and family to go on crazy adventures in the company of another even crazier than himself. But when Sancho was made (in a joke, as later became known) governor of Barataria, Teresa Panza blew her mouth and exclaimed: "Honor to merit! FIN 1984
title: Realismo femenino
author: Marco Denevi
